model_answer:
The correct chronological order of the sub-events is: (3) The instructor greets the class and introduces Lesson 2 on the mouth, pharynx, and larynx over a static title slide. (1) The speaker describes a chain through the nose and "headphones as a speaker" while the slide shows two YouTube links. (4) The "Nose to Mouth" slide is shown as the speaker explains the nasopharynx and oropharynx connection. (2) A slide titled "Mouth" appears as the speaker recommends nose breathing and notes mouth breathing during exertion or blockage.

Therefore, the answer is B: 3 -> 1 -> 4 -> 2.

The correct chronological order of the sub-events is option B: 1 -> 4 -> 6 -> 7 -> 2 -> 5 -> 3. 

The first event mentioned is the "Pharynx" slide, which定义了pharynx及其在消化和呼吸系统中的作用。接下来是关于喉的细节，包括展示喉部的特写图像以及提到氦气、硫化氢氟烷和氙气等气体；然后是一个音乐音符在图像结束时响起。之后是“Your Job”幻灯片的出现，其中教师分配了研究如何工作的任务，并表示将在下节课见到大家。然后是关于“Cleft Palate”幻灯片的内容，其中解释了手术可以轻松修复腭裂的影响。接着是关于“Larynx”幻灯片的出现，其中提到了Adam's apple、voice box和vocal cords控制音调和音量。最后是显示“Pharynx”部分的划分图，教师命名了鼻窦、口腔和咽部，并解释了在进食时会用到的epiglottis阻止食物进入气管。

这些事件按照时间顺序排列，符合逻辑顺序。
